name = input("What is your name?")
age = input("how old are you?")

print(f"Hi {name}, you are {age} years old") #python3
print("Hi {1}, you are {0} years old".format(name, age)) #python2
print("Hi {name}, you are {age} years old".format(name="john", age=55))
